snippet: KRIEGLER--Grace L.,96, of Great Neck, NY passed away February 19, 2016 peacefully in her sleep at home. Beloved wife of the late Raymond M. Kriegler. Proud and devoted mother of Bonnie, Laurie, Benjamin and spouses Neil, Barry and Vonda. Amazing grandmother to Romy and Sadie. Grace loved her family and throughout her active life was a world traveler, volunteer with bilingual pre-k education, avid bridge and tennis player with so many at SRTC. A founder of JCBO Sisterhood and Chorus, and strong supporter of ORT, JTS and NWF. For the family and dear friends Grace leaves a legacy of love, caring, compassion, understanding and the ideal of individual strength to overcome personal adversity. Cared for in her last days by Betty. She will be greatly missed by all. Graveside services will take place on Sunday February 21, 2016 at 10:30am at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY. Family Shiva details- www.riversidenassaunorth chapels.com -516-487-9600 1/3
